Here is the music player.

To Do:
- The mediaPlayer class should be implemented
- OnClickListeners should be attached to each button, therefore they behave as expected: Repeat the playlist, Skip to previous track, Play/Pause the player, Skip to the next track, Shuffle the playlist
- Implement the ProgressBar with the current state of play and the length of the track played with the left and right TextViews
- Retrieve information about the playlist from the PlaylistActivity (passing bundle with Intent)
- Add Title, Artist, Album resource displayed on the Image of the album

Here is the playlist currently playing.

To Do:
- Implementation of a scrolling list with the tracks in the playlist
- Implementation of an architecture with thumbnails for each track (image, title, artist, album, track duration)
- Add possibility to inflate a thumbnail to get more info on a track
- Add possibility to remove a track from the list
- Create a Button with EditTextView to allow to save the current playlist as favorite which will be displayed on top of the library
- Implementation of a small player UI to view the current track played

Here is the music library.

To Do:
- Implementation of a scrollable TabLayout with three TabItems (filters): Favorite tracks, Albums, Artists
- Implementation of a search interface using both the search widget and the search dialog
- Create checkboxes (see QuizApp for methods such as isChecked) to display whether the track is in the playlist or not
- Add a recycle bin to remove definitely an element from the library or create a remove button

Here are the settings.

To Do:
- Implementation of a theme changer (colors, size of the UI) with RadioButtons to allow the user to change the general theme of the UI
- Create an equalizer (Equalizer class) with customised SeekBars to mix the output signal of the player
- Propose common types of preset mix setting
